parameters.name: ApiIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the APIs. Separate multiple API IDs with commas (,). A maximum of 100 API IDs can be entered.

parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the appplication. The ID is generated by the system and globally unique.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group. This ID is generated by the system and globally unique.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The name of the runtime environment. Valid values:

*   **RELEASE**
*   **TEST**
